overview:
Long-standing, professional search engine optimiser and Internet marketer.

Justin has been providing SEO and online marketing services since 2004. In this time just has also built several popular websites such as Eye on Spain, and sold many along the way.

Justin’s engineering background means that he relishes analysing data from all the testing of over 500 websites at his disposal that he uses to test out all the latest online marketing strategies and Google algorithm updates.

He has also successfully helped various companies to recover from penalties that their websites were suffering in Google search results, assisted others to control their online reputation and has often been the top affiliate for large brands promoting their latest online campaigns.

Justin provides a very professional service with a strict focus on total client satisfaction, providing the highest levels of customer service and support at all times.
